original_text:
Will it make an agreement with you
    for you to take it as your slave for life?
korean_text: 어찌 그것이 너와 계약을 맺고 너는 그를 영원히 종으로 삼겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Will it make an agreement with you
for you to take it as your slave for life?
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 그것을 평생 종으로 삼기 위해?
